qa_issues.description: The title lacks specificity about the content and purpose of the blog post for readers unfamiliar with the topic.
qa_issues.suggested_fix: Consider adding a subtitle that explains what aspect of deep learning is covered, such as 'An Introduction to Its Concepts and Applications'.

qa_issues.description: The explanation of supervised learning does not provide an example, while other sections do provide examples, leading to inconsistency in detail.
qa_issues.suggested_fix: Add an example to the supervised learning section, similar to how examples are included in unsupervised and reinforcement learning.

new_lines: An Introduction to Its Concepts and Applications
For example, classifying emails as spam or not spam.
